title: Greg Miller's Thoughts on The Xbox Rumors - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.07.24
description:
Shop the new collections at kindafunny.com/store!

Greg and Blessing chat about what's Greg's thoughts are on Xbox going multiplatform, Spider-Man 2 getting New Game Plus, and news on Cyberpunk 2077.

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:02:05 - Greg’s Takeaway from the Xbox Rumors
00:24:28 - Housekeeping
 - Our Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth preview is up as a Kinda Funny Gamescast featuring AEW’s Adam Cole. Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGamescast
 - Two new drops on the merch store! Kinda Funny Broadcast and the Cozy collection are available for the next two weeks on kindafunny.com/store, grab ‘em while you can!
KFAF is coming back on February 9th for Part 2 of our Anniversary Stream! The photoshop challenge’s theme is “The Future”. Tweet your photoshops @KindaFunnyVids with #KFAF to join in on the fun!
     -  The Roper Report   -
00:28:00 - New Game Plus is finally coming to Spider-Man 2
00:37:59 - Cyberpunk 2077 Sequel Hires industry veterans
00:43:06 - Suicide Squad’s Main Villian might be The Next Playable Character
00:44:17 - SUICIDE SQUAD SPOILERS
00:52:20 - Capcom survey asks players if they want to see sequels or remakes of lapsed series
00:57:35 - Wee News!
00:59:53 - SuperChats
01:02:05 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Bless & Tim
